column1: State and Local General Expenditures, Per Capita, FY 2016
[1] Population data are from the midpoint of the observation year.
[2] Alaska and Hawaii are excluded from the Far West regional totals, but are included in the U.S. totals.

Suggested Citation: US Census Bureau. 2000, updated annually. Annual Survey of State and Local Government Finances, 1977-2017. Compiled by the Urban-Brookings Tax Policy Center. Washington, DC: Urban-Brookings Tax Policy Centers (2016). Date of Access: (30-Mar-2020).
